story:
Once upon a time in the little town of Brightville, there lived a young boy named Tommy. Tommy was adventurous, curious, and full of imagination. Every night before bed, his mother would tell him a bedtime story to help him drift off into dreamland.

One evening, as the stars twinkled in the night sky, Tommy's mother sat beside him on his small bed and began the story of "The Magical Forest". 

In the heart of Brightville, there was a hidden forest that was said to be magical. Legends told of a powerful wizard who lived there, granting wishes to those who passed through under the light of the full moon. Tommy's eyes widened with excitement as he listened to the enchanting tale of the mystical forest.

As his mother weaved the story, Tommy pictured himself exploring the lush green trees, hearing the whispers of the wind, and feeling the soft glow of the moonlight illuminating his path. The thought of meeting the wise wizard filled his heart with wonder and anticipation.

With a gentle smile, Tommy's mother tucked him into bed and kissed his forehead goodnight. Tommy closed his eyes, feeling the magic of the story wrapping around him like a warm blanket. As he drifted off to sleep, he dreamed of embarking on his own adventure into the enchanted forest, guided by the light of the full moon and the promise of endless possibilities.

And so, in the land of dreams, Tommy discovered that the most magical adventures could be found within the depths of his own imagination.

The end. Sleep tight, little one, and may your dreams be filled with wonder and joy. Goodnight.
